features: STACKABLE & NON STAINABLE : Our Lightweight Dinnerware Set Is A Healthy Alternative To Plastic Dishes Set. The Dorm Kitchen Essentials aka Rv Dinnerware Sets Are Stain Resistant & Travel Friendly!

NON-TOXIC ELDRS/ KIDS DINNERWARE SET: The Wheat Straw Plates And Wheat Straw Bowls Are Made Up Of “wheat Straws Fibres Pp”, And 100% Bpa Free. An Ethical Replacement For Plastic Plates And Bowls Sets!

LIGHTWEIGHT & STURDY DINNERWARE : Our Dorm Dishes Have Sandy Finish Look In Vibrant Yellow Blue Cyan Peach Colors. This Non Breakable Dinnerware Is Like A Piece Of Art Which Enhances Home Décor Reminding Of Family Harmony!

FREEZER, DISHWASHER & MICROWAVE SAFE PLATES : Do You Like To Eat Left Overs At Later Time? Enjoy A Warm Feast In Microwavable Plates. Horrified Of Water Scarcity ? Save Water And Your Energy With Our Dishwasher Safe Plates. The Unbreakable Microwave Safe Dishes Are Life Savior, A Long Lasting Yet Friendly Quality To Keep.

VERSATILE : Our Elders/kids Dinnerware Set Is A Supreme Choice For Dining Inside Or Out. Whether You’re Looking For Some Student Dishes, Camping Dinnerware Or Wish To Carry Some Picnic Dishes, These Outdoor Dinnerware Sets Are More Desirable Than The Rest To Mark Every Occasion As Super Memorable!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DINETHICS WHEAT STRAW DINNERWARE SET: A SUSTAINABLE ALTERNATIVE TO TRADITIONAL PLASTIC DINNERWARE! Looking for a way to add some heart to your home dining experience? Look no further than DINETHICS Wheat Straw Dinnerware Set! Crafted from natural wheat straw, this Dinnerware is not just a sustainable choice - it's also an expression of love for the planet and all its inhabitants. Outclass dinnerware comprises; ● 4x Plate: Width 8.9”, Height 1.4” ● 4x Bowl: Width 5.9”, Height 3”, Capacity 24oz ● 4x Cup: Width 2,8”, Height 4.1”, Capacity 12oz ● 4x Cutlery Set: 1 fork, 1 spoon, 1 knife, a pair of chopsticks, 1 case Each set comes in 4 colors: Dark green, Offwhite, Dark grey, Blue!

AN UNBREAKABLE DINNERWARE SET: STAY STRESS-FREE WITH MICROWAVE-SAFE DINNERWARE THAT WON’T MELT OR CRACK! Not only is our Wheat Straw Dinnerware kind to the earth, but it's also gentle on your microwave and dishwasher, making it a convenient choice for your busy household. While heating food, don’t worry about the melt or the awful smell of plastic in your food. Because DINETHICS is providing microwave-safe dinnerware for you to enjoy a warm & tasty feast. Full tummy after a meal makes you lazy and not put your hands in the sink? Wait wait wait! DINETHICS makes you save water and energy with its dishwasher-safe dinner set. The Unbreakable dinnerware neither melts in the microwave nor cracks in the dishwasher. CAUTION: DO NOT USE NEAR FLAME CAUTION: DO NOT USE IT IN THE OVEN. CAUTION: MAXIMUM HEAT RESISTANCE IN THE MICROWAVE IS 248°F UNDER 5 MINUTES.

STURDY, ADAPTABLE AND ALL ROUNDER! HEALTHY CHOICE FOR KIDS/ELDERS! DINETHICS standard size dinnerware ain't only safe & healthy for kids but also youngsters and old people. LESS HECTIC LIFE! DINETHICS fridge safe dinnerware doesn’t let you worry while cold preserving food. LIGHTWEIGHT & STACKABLE! Be sure enough to carry a lightweight dinnerware that's not only handy/portable but also stacks quite easily in your cupboards, drawers, and carry cases.

HEALTH FRIENDLY COME TRAVEL FRIENDLY DINETHICS Wheat Straw Bowls Dinnerware is also incredibly lightweight, durable, and fridge-safe making them easy to carry and pack for your next camping or RV trip. Also with its stackable design, it takes up minimal space in your kitchen cabinets or camping gear.

IDEAL FOR CAMPING, PICNICS, RV TRIPS With a durable material and tactile quality, our outdoor dinnerware set is ideal either inside or out. The feathery dinnerware is a happy-go-lucky choice to make for any picnic treat, backyard BBQs, camping, school, or office!

EXPRESS YOUR LOVE FOR THE WORLD AND ALL THE CREATURES THAT CALL IT HOME! With the desire of keeping a cool color for a serene feel, and for an exciting yet righteous experience, it is certain that packaging is safe & sound. DINETHICS WHEAT STRAW DINNERWARE SET has been sourced through the maximum feasible origins to connect with our family of customers in joyful & ethical ways. - COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY We take pride in our commitment to sustainability but what really sets our Wheat Straw Dinnerware set apart is the emotional connection they create. By choosing our dinnerware, you are not only making a conscious effort to reduce your carbon footprint but also supporting a healthier planet. - So why settle for ordinary dinnerware when you can savor the sustainability with our versatile Wheat Straw Dinnerware set? - BUY LESS, CHOOSE WELL!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for camping
reviews.reviewText: Nice color choices, when camping everyone can pick their own, unbreakable, easy to wash, lightweight. Works well for camping trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for use with toddler. Very functional. Easy to wash. Durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and ethical
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing not only are they cute I've had no problem with them even with microwave or freezing hasn't warped or distorted at all. This is my second set still have the other one from early last year with no damage or discoloration. The sets are so cute I just got them because the kids can't break them but they're ethical as well which is a plus. Will purchase more sets in different colors when available and will always be my go to when I need more. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This set of dinnerware was purchased to take with us in an RV and they are perfect for that purpose. I will use them for outdoor dining as well for similar reasons, lightweight and durable. The colors are vibrant and the pieces are a great size (we don’t like huge plates) for adults and children. They came very quickly and are a great bargain. Also microwaveable and dishwasher safe.My husband’s family have been wheat farmers for decades, so we were thrilled to see these great items are made with wheat straw! Great idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall they are a good product. They are thinner and more flexible than I expected based on the description. But not as cheap feeling as plastic. They do feel more durable than plastic, not as likely to get scratched.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using for 1 year, and LOVE these
reviews.reviewText: We moved into an RV to travel, and wanted some dishes that were lightweight, and sturdy. We don't like heavy breakable dishes anyways, so this wasn't a big change for us. These have been awesome. Our bowls get the heaviest usage, and show the use with some light staining on a few of them. They're flexible, durable, and affordable. I will be buying more. I posted pictures to show the staining (bowls - from not stained to the most stained), and the scratches (plate). This doesn't bother us, or affect the function, and it's not like we bought wheat straw dishes to impress anyone 😅, so it's just not a big deal for us. It also took some time and lots of use for these stains and scratches to happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They don’t break
reviews.reviewText: These dishes don’t break. That is a big plus for me. My daughter is prone to dropping a things and these do not break and I finally have dishes that work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you can love dishes we love these.
reviews.reviewText: We like the fact that they are lightweight and durable and are microwave and dishwasher safe. They fit with our apartment lifestyle. And we like the modern colors.
